backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with all game data types, player profile structures, and initial inâ€‘memory maps for profiles, combat, clans, and dungeons.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented 3D dungeon viewer features with associated files, components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides concise descriptions of various frontend files and their roles across pages, components, and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers and theme variables for light/dark modes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app root and loading the main TypeScript entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling routing, authentication gating, profile setup, and page rendering within a themed layout.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication wrapper that manages Internet Identity login/logout, loading states, and displays a login card when unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/dungeon3d/dungeo: Generates deterministic hotspot positions for quests and crates in a semi-circular layout.
frontend/src/components/dungeon3d/Dungeo: Renders a 3D dungeon scene with lighting, walls, floor, and clickable hotspot markers, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/dungeon3d/Hotspo: 3D floating hotspot marker component for quests and crates with hover and selection effects.
frontend/src/components/dungeon3d/useWeb: Hook that detects WebGL support and reports initialization errors.
frontend/src/components/GameLayout.tsx: Main game UI layout with navigation, header, user info, currency display, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog for creating a player profile and setting a username with clipboard copy and advanced principal view.
frontend/src/components/ProgressionPanel: Displays survivor level, experience progress, and core stats with icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking. Wraps AuthClient creation with custom options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods, including profile management, username setup, and various game-related mutations with error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures global Tailwind CSS layers and theme variables for light and dark modes, applying base styling across the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app by rendering it with React Query and Internet Identity providers, importing global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Renders an admin-only interface for modifying player data, adding items, and creating events using various query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AnnouncementsPage.tsx: Displays all announcements and allows admins to publish new ones, with timestamp formatting and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/AuraClickerPage.tsx: Implements the Aura Clicker game UI, handling aura power clicks, level progression, and rebirth actions with profile data.
frontend/src/pages/ClansPage.tsx: UI for viewing clans, creating join listings, forming clans from listings, and joining clans (including random join).
frontend/src/pages/DungeonPage.tsx: Displays dungeons, quests, and crates with 3D viewer support and handlers for starting/completing quests and unlocking crates.
frontend/src/pages/GameplayPage.tsx: Manages combat with enemies and bots, including starting fights, performing attacks, and tracking active combat state.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home hub showing player profile status and navigation cards for survivors, combat, inventory, clans, and more.
frontend/src/pages/InventoryPage.tsx: Lists weapons and pets, showing equipped items and allowing players to equip new gear.
frontend/src/pages/KillersPage.tsx: Displays the killer progression list, shows unlocked killers, and allows unlocking the next killer via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Loads shop items and profile data, handles purchasing the admin panel and individual shop items.
frontend/src/pages/SocialPage.tsx: Provides UI to follow and unfollow users, resolve usernames, and view followers, following, and friends.
frontend/src/pages/SurvivorsPage.tsx: Lists the user's survivors, allows creating new survivors with custom stats, and setting the active survivor.
frontend/src/pages/UpdatesPage.tsx: Displays a static list of recent game updates with version, date, descriptions, and feature lists.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL params (including hash routing), persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container queries, animations, and theme extensions.
project_state.json: Defines the current project state, including game concept, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature records.
